column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Three big slices and a couple refills of diet Cokes later
column2: I was done. DONE. Each slice practically weighed a pound each. I needed a siesta big time
column3: to lay my head down on something
column5: we go. Food coma had taken me by the huevos
column6: and I was at its mercy. Lou Malnati's
column7: you knocked my socks off. Literally.
